document_data.name: Jorus Azuremantle
document_data.mainbody: '''Jorus Azuremantle''' was a [[Half-elf|half-elven]] [[wizard]] and the leader of the [[Spellguard]], assuming the title after [[Taern "Thunderspell" Hornblade]]. He was also a member of the [[Council of 12 Peers]].
document_data.Personality: Noted as being both reserved and powerful
document_data.History:
In [[1369 DR]], when Taern "Thunderspell" Hornblade became the High Mage of [[Silverymoon]], Jorus was appointed as the new [[Lord Warder]] and leader of the Spellguard.

By [[1370 DR]], Jorus sat on the [[Council of 12 Peers]] to help [[Alustriel Silverhand]] form the [[League of the Silver Marches]].
